item.title: Opening a blog on a budget
item.description: What better way to start a programming/technical/anything else blog than describing the journey to set it up? TL;DR: I used Hugo and Netlify to create and deploy the blog and Namecheap.com to buy a cheap domain name. A bit of history Â¶ Since I started programming I thought about opening my personal blog. I kept procrastinating due to a lack of time, money, tools and knowledge. The rare occasions I looked for a solution I always ended up with half solutions or expensive options.
